data.text: @nycHealthy It’s insane that you’re rolling back all the Covid restrictions for everyone except the least vulnerable 2-5 age group. These draconian and ridiculous mask mandates make no sense and do irreparable harm to young kids who are learning to emote and speak.

@nycHealthy The vax prevented 48,000 deaths in the city??  That is cartoonishly ridiculous.
The worst of the pandemic was over in the NY area by April 2020 because NY failed to flatten the curve.  Politicians and big pharma will take credit though. https://t.co/IF8J0daeRl
@nycHealthy @NYCMayor Your mask of a young children because they need to hear mouth sounds lip formations if they have a speech problem.

@nycHealthy @NYCMayor Get the young children out of the mask they need to see facial expressions everybody else is out of the mess now let's get real already. Especially that have speech therapy they need to see mouth and lips.
@nycHealthy Every jab that's administered is more money in Adams pocket so why on earth would he stop the Mandates? This modern day slave catcher making his millions at your expense.
@nycHealthy FDA and CDC study shows risk of jab to kids https://t.co/iAZmw52e7d
